<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_toggl_clients</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Display Sync Status</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

if (gs.getProperty('sn_toggl.twowaysync') == 'true') {
	gs.addInfoMessage('Two-way sync with Toggl is currently enabled. Creating, modifying or deleting records will be reflected in Toggl.');
} else {
	gs.addInfoMessage('Two-way sync with Toggl is currently disabled. Creating, modifying or deleting records will not be reflected in Toggl.');
}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-22 14:39:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>af1fa3992ff210109a34206df699b61c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display Sync Status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_af1fa3992ff210109a34206df699b61c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-22 14:41:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=af1fa3992ff210109a34206df699b61c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4fb7a8c42f2a10109a34206df699b680
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TogglUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utils for Toggl integration.</description><name>TogglUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var TogglUtils = Class.create();
TogglUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.account = new GlideRecord('u_toggl_account');
        if (this.userHasAccount()) {
            this.account.get('sys_created_by', gs.getUserName());
            if (this.account.u_api_token) {
                this.API_TOKEN = this.account.u_api_token;
            }
        }



    },

    userHasAccount: function() {
        var account = new GlideRecord('u_toggl_account');
        return account.get('sys_created_by', gs.getUserName());
    },

    userHasActiveAccount: function() {
        return (this.userHasAccount && this.API_TOKEN);
    },
	
	dataSyncEnabled: function() {
		return this.account.u_sync_data;
	},
	
	timeEntrySyncEnabled: function() {
		return this.account.u_sync_time_entries;
	},

    connectToToggl: function(username, password) {
        var decrypted = new GlideEncrypter().decrypt(password);
        var authString = username + ":" + decrypted;
        var encoded = GlideStringUtil.base64Encode(authString);
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Users', 'Get User');  
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Basic ' + encoded);
        try {
            var response = r.execute();
            var result = this._handleResponse(response);
            return result;
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Something went wrong while connecting to Toggl');
            gs.debug('Something went wrong while connecting to Toggl: ' + ex);
        }
    },


    syncWorkspaces: function() {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Workspaces', 'Default GET');
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        var response = r.execute();
        var workspaces = this._handleResponse(response);
        var ws = new GlideRecord('u_toggl_workspaces');
        var workspaceArr = [];

        ws.initialize();
        for (var w in workspaces) {
            if (ws.get('u_id', workspaces[w].id)) {
                ws.get('u_id', workspaces[w].id)
            }
            ws.u_account = this.account.getUniqueValue();
            ws.u_id = workspaces[w].id;
            ws.u_name = workspaces[w].name;
            if (JSUtil.notNil(ws.sys_id)) {
                ws.update();
            } else {
                ws.insert()
            }

            gs.addInfoMessage('Successfully synced Toggl workspace ' + workspaces[w].id);
            gs.info('Successfully synced Toggl workspace ' + workspaces[w].id);
            workspaceArr.push(workspaces[w].id.toString());
        }

        return workspaceArr;
    },
	
	getWorkspaceIDs: function() {
		var ws = new GlideRecord('u_toggl_workspaces');
		var wsArr = []
		ws.addQuery('sys_created_by', gs.getUserName());
		ws.query();
		while(ws.next()) {
			wsArr.push(ws.u_id.toString())
		}
		return wsArr
	},


    syncClients: function(wid) {
        var clients = new GlideRecord('u_toggl_clients');
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Workspaces', 'Get Workspace Clients');
        r.setStringParameter('wid', wid);
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        try {
            var response = r.execute();
            var clientData = this._handleResponse(response)
            for (var c in clientData) {
                if (clients.get('u_id', clientData[c].id)) {
                    clients.get('u_id', clientData[c].id)
                }
                clients.u_name = clientData[c].name;
                clients.u_id = clientData[c].id;
                clients.u_wid = wid;
                clients.u_workspace = this._getRecordByRefID(wid, 'u_toggl_workspaces');
                if (JSUtil.nil(clients.sys_id)) {
                    clients.insert()
                } else {
                    clients.update()
                }
            }

            var successMessage = 'Successfully synced ' + clientData.length + ' clients for Toggl workspace ' + wid;
            gs.addInfoMessage(successMessage);
            gs.info(successMessage);
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error('An error occurred with syncing Toggl clients: ' + ex);
        }

    },



    syncResource: function(resourceGR, operation) {
        var resourceName = this._getResourceName(resourceGR)
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl ' + resourceName + 's', operation + ' ' + resourceName);
        if (operation == 'Create' || operation == 'Update') {
            var body = {};
            var details = {
                'name': resourceGR.u_name + "",
                'wid': resourceGR.u_wid + ""
            }

            if (resourceName == 'Project' && JSUtil.notNil(resourceGR.u_cid)) {
                details['cid'] = resourceGR.u_cid + "";
            }

            body[resourceName.toLowerCase()] = details;
            body = JSON.stringify(body);
            r.setRequestBody(body);

        }

        if (operation == 'Update' || operation == 'Delete') {
            if (this._checkIfResourceExists(resourceGR)) {
                r.setStringParameter('id', resourceGR.u_id + "")
            } else {
				gs.info('The resource ' + resourceGR.u_name + ' does not exist in Toggl')
                return;
            }
        }
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader())
        try {
            var response = r.execute();
            return this._handleResponse(response);
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Something went wrong with the operation');
            gs.error('Something went wrong operation ' + operation + ' ' + resourceName + ': ' + ex);

        }

    },


    _getResourceName: function(resourceGR) {
        var resourceName;
        if (resourceGR.getTableName().indexOf('clients') > -1) {
            resourceName = 'Client';
        } else if (resourceGR.getTableName().indexOf('projects') > -1) {
            resourceName = 'Project';
        }
        return resourceName;
    },

    _checkIfResourceExists: function(resourceGR) {
        var resourceName = this._getResourceName(resourceGR);
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl ' + resourceName + 's', 'Get ' + resourceName + ' Details');
		r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        r.setStringParameter('id', resourceGR.u_id + "");
        try {
            var response = r.execute();
			var status = response.getStatusCode();
            if (status == '200') {
                return true;
            } else if (status == '404') {
                return false;
            } else {
				gs.error('Fetching Toggl ' + resourceName + ' failed with status code ' + status);
			}
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Something went wrong with connecting to Toggl');
            gs.error('Something went wrong with connecting to Toggl: ' + ex);
        }
    },



    syncProjects: function(wid) {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Workspaces', 'Get Workspace Projects');
        r.setStringParameter('wid', wid);
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        try {
            var response = r.execute();
            var projectData = this._handleResponse(response)
            var projects = new GlideRecord('u_toggl_projects');
            for (var p in projectData) {
                if (projects.get('u_id', projectData[p].id)) {
                    projects.get('u_id', projectData[p].id)
                }
                projects.u_id = projectData[p].id;
                projects.u_name = projectData[p].name;
                projects.u_cid = projectData[p].cid;
                projects.u_client = this._getRecordByRefID(projects.u_cid, 'u_toggl_clients');
                projects.u_active = projectData[p].active;
                projects.u_wid = wid;
                projects.u_workspace = this._getRecordByRefID(wid, 'u_toggl_workspaces');
                if (JSUtil.nil(projects.sys_id)) {
                    projects.insert();
                } else {
                    projects.update()
                }
            }
            var successMessage = 'Successfully synced ' + projectData.length + ' projects for Toggl workspace ' + wid;

            gs.addInfoMessage(successMessage)
            gs.info(successMessage);

        } catch (ex) {
            gs.debug('An error occurred with syncing Toggl projects: ' + ex);
        }
    },

    syncTimeEntries: function(startdate, enddate) {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Time Entries', 'Get Entries');
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        if (startdate) {
            r.setQueryParameter('start_date', this._convertToISODate(startdate));
        }
        if (enddate) {
            r.setQueryParameter('end_date', this._convertToISODate(enddate));
        }
        try {
            var response = r.execute();
            var entries = this._handleResponse(response);
            var timeEntry = new GlideRecord('u_time_entries');
            for (var e in entries) {
                if (timeEntry.get('u_id', entries[e].id)) {
                    timeEntry.get('u_id', entries[e].id)
                }
                timeEntry.u_description = entries[e].description;
                timeEntry.u_id = entries[e].id;
                timeEntry.u_wid = entries[e].wid;
                timeEntry.u_pid = entries[e].pid;
                timeEntry.u_start = this._convertToGlideDate(entries[e].start)
                timeEntry.u_stop = this._convertToGlideDate(entries[e].stop)
                timeEntry.u_duration = new GlideDuration(entries[e].duration * 1000);
                timeEntry.u_project = this._getRecordByRefID(timeEntry.u_pid, 'u_toggl_projects')
                if (JSUtil.nil(timeEntry.sys_id)) {
                    timeEntry.insert();
                } else {
                    timeEntry.update();
                }


            }
            var successMessage = 'Successfully synced ' + entries.length + ' time entries';
            gs.addInfoMessage(successMessage);
            gs.info(successMessage);

        } catch (ex) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('An error occurred with syncing entries')
            gs.error('Error with syncing entries: ' + ex);
        }

    },


    startTimer: function(task, description, projectGR) {
        if (this.timerIsRunningForTask(task)) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('There is an already running time entry for this task');
            return;
        }
        var body = {};
        body['time_entry'] = {};
        var fields = gs.getProperty('sn_toggl.default.time.entry.description').split(',');
        if (JSUtil.nil(description)) {
            description = "";
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                description += task[field] + " ";
            });
        }
        body.time_entry['description'] = description;
        body.time_entry['pid'] = projectGR ? projectGR.u_id + "" : "";
        body.time_entry['created_with'] = 'ServiceNow';


        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Time Entries', 'Start Timer');
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        r.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));
        try {
            var response = r.executeAsync();
            var result = this._handleResponse(response);
            if (result) {
                gs.addInfoMessage('Timer started');
                return result;
            }
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Something went wrong with starting the timer');
            gs.debug(ex);
        }

    },

    stopTimer: function(entryGR) {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Time Entries', 'Stop Timer');
        r.setStringParameter('id', entryGR.u_id + "");
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        try {
            var response = r.execute();
            var result = this._handleResponse(response);

            if (result) {
                gs.addInfoMessage('Timer stopped');
                return result;
            }
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Something went wrong with stopping the timer');
            gs.error("Something went wrong with stopping the timer " + ex);
        }


    },

    pollTimer: function(entryGR) {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Toggl Time Entries', 'Get Entry');
        r.setStringParameter('id', entryGR.u_id + "");
        r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', this._setAuthHeader());
        try {
            var response = r.executeAsync();
			gs.log('Response ' + response);
            var result = this._handleResponse(response);
			gs.log('Result ' + result);

            return result;
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Something went wrong with polling the timer');
            gs.error("Something went wrong with polling the timer " + ex);
        }
    },

    createTimeEntry: function(task, result) {
        var timeEntry = new GlideRecord('u_time_entries');
        timeEntry.initialize();
        timeEntry.u_id = result.data.id;
        timeEntry.u_description = result.data.description;
        timeEntry.u_wid = result.data.wid;
		timeEntry.u_pid = result.data.pid;
		timeEntry.u_project = this._getRecordByRefID(timeEntry.u_pid, 'u_toggl_projects')
        timeEntry.u_start = this._convertToGlideDate(result.data.start);
        timeEntry.u_active = true;
        timeEntry.u_task = task.sys_id;
        timeEntry.insert();
    },

    updateTimeEntry: function(entry, result) {
        entry.u_stop = this._convertToGlideDate(result.data.stop);
        var ms = Number(result.data.duration) * 1000
        var gdur = new GlideDuration(ms);
        entry.u_duration = gdur;
        entry.u_active = false;
        entry.update();
        gs.info("Synced Time Entry " + entry.u_id)
    },

    updateTimeEntryForTask: function(task, result) {
        var timeEntry = this.getActiveTimeEntryForTask(task);
        this.updateTimeEntry(timeEntry, result);
    },


    getActiveTimeEntryForTask: function(task) {
        var timeEntry = new GlideRecord('u_time_entries');
        timeEntry.addQuery('u_task.sys_id', task.sys_id);
        timeEntry.addQuery('u_active', true);
        timeEntry.query();
        if (timeEntry.next()) {
            return timeEntry;
        }
    },
	
	userHasActiveEntryForTask: function (task) {
		var entry = this.getActiveTimeEntryForTask(task);
		return entry.sys_created_by == gs.getUserName();
	},
	
	getActiveEntriesForUser: function () {
		var timeEntry = new GlideRecord('u_time_entries');
        timeEntry.addQuery('u_active', true);
		timeEntry.addQuery('sys_created_by', gs.getUserName())
		timeEntry.query();
        return timeEntry
	},
	
	userHasActiveEntries: function () {
		var entries = this.getActiveEntriesForUser();
		return entries.next();
      
	},

    inActivateOrDeleteEntry: function(entryGR, responseBody) {
        if (JSUtil.notNil(responseBody)) {
            if (JSUtil.notNil(responseBody.data.stop)) {
                this.updateTimeEntry(entryGR, responseBody);
                gs.info('Inactivated time entry ' + entryGR.u_id)
                return "Inactivated"
            }
            if (responseBody['error'] == 404) {
                entryGR.deleteRecord();
                gs.info('Deleted time entry ' + entryGR.u_id);
                return "Deleted"

            }
        }
    },


    timerIsRunningForTask: function(task) {
        return JSUtil.notNil(this.getActiveTimeEntryForTask(task))
        
    },

    calculateTimeForTask: function(task) {
        var total = 0;
        var dur = new GlideAggregate('u_time_entries');
        dur.addAggregate('SUM', 'u_duration');
        dur.addQuery('u_task.sys_id', task.sys_id);
        dur.setGroup(false);
        dur.query();
        while (dur.next()) {
            total = dur.getAggregate('SUM', 'u_duration');
        }
        return new GlideDuration(total);
    },
	
	


    _getRecordByRefID: function(refID, table) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
		if (JSUtil.notNil(refID)) {
        gr.get('u_id', refID.toString());
        return gr.getUniqueValue();
		}
    },

    _setAuthHeader: function() {
        if (this.API_TOKEN) {
            var authString = this.API_TOKEN + ":api_token";
            var encodedAuth = GlideStringUtil.base64Encode(authString);
            var encodedHeader = 'Basic ' + encodedAuth;
            return encodedHeader;
        } else {
            gs.addErrorMessage('No account activated or missing API token');
        }
    },

    _handleResponse: function(response) {
        var statusCode = response.getStatusCode();
		var body = response.getBody();
		  if (body && statusCode == '200') {
            return JSON.parse(body);
        } else {
            gs.error('Error connecting to Toggl. Status code ' + statusCode);
            gs.addErrorMessage('Something went wrong with connecting to Toggl');
            return {
                'error': statusCode
            };

        }

    },

    _convertToGlideDate: function(date) {
        var datetime = date.replace(/T/, " ");
        datetime = datetime.replace(/Z/, "");
        var result = new GlideCalendarDateTime(datetime);
        return result;
    },

    _convertToISODate: function(gdt) {
        var ms = gdt.getNumericValue();
        return new Date(ms).toISOString();
    },


    type: 'TogglUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-05 16:42:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>4fb7a8c42f2a10109a34206df699b680</sys_id><sys_mod_count>119</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TogglUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4fb7a8c42f2a10109a34206df699b680</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-06 08:17:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rest_message_fn"><sys_rest_message_fn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><authentication_type>inherit_from_parent</authentication_type><basic_auth_password/><basic_auth_profile/><basic_auth_user/><content/><function_name>Delete Client</function_name><http_method>delete</http_method><lock>false</lock><oauth2_profile/><protocol_name/><qualified_name>Toggl Clients [ Delete Client ]</qualified_name><rest_endpoint>https://api.track.toggl.com/api/v8/clients/${id}</rest_endpoint><rest_message display_value="Toggl Clients">10657e552f7210109a34206df699b636</rest_message><sys_class_name>sys_rest_message_fn</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-22 10:30:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>71163e192f7210109a34206df699b6e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delete Client</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rest_message_fn_71163e192f7210109a34206df699b6e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-20 06:26:39</sys_updated_on><use_basic_auth>false</use_basic_auth><use_mid_server/><use_mutual_auth>false</use_mutual_auth></sys_rest_message_fn></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_629ab8162f0350109a34206df699b603
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_toggl_projects</collection><condition>new TogglUtils().twoWaySyncEnabled();</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Display Two Way Sync Status</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

	if (current.isNewRecord()) {
		  gs.addInfoMessage('Two way sync enabled. Saving this record will create a new project in Toggl.');
	} else {
		 gs.addInfoMessage('Two way sync enabled. Any changes made to this record will be reflected in Toggl.');
	}
	
   

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-06 14:20:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>629ab8162f0350109a34206df699b603</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display Two Way Sync Status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_629ab8162f0350109a34206df699b603</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-06 14:25:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=629ab8162f0350109a34206df699b603"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e528e7d52ff210109a34206df699b60c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_toggl_projects</collection><condition>new TogglUtils().dataSyncEnabled() && new TogglUtils().twoWaySyncEnabled();</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Toggl - Sync Project</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var toggl = new TogglUtils();
    switch (current.operation()) {
        case ('insert'):
			// Prevent sync if record is created from Toggl
		if (current.u_id != "") {
		    return;
		}
            result = toggl.syncTogglObject(current, 'Create');
            current.u_id = result.data.id;
            current.u_active = result.data.active;
            current.setWorkflow(false);
            current.update();
            break;
        case ('update'):
            toggl.syncTogglObject(current, 'Update');
            break;
        case ('delete'):
            toggl.syncTogglObject(current, 'Delete');
        default:
            break;
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-22 14:08:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e528e7d52ff210109a34206df699b60c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggl - Sync Project</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e528e7d52ff210109a34206df699b60c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-20 09:08:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e528e7d52ff210109a34206df699b60c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2deb6a912f7210109a34206df699b618
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_toggl_clients</collection><condition>new TogglUtils().dataSyncEnabled() && newTogglUtils().twoWaySyncEnabled();</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Toggl - Sync Client</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var toggl = new TogglUtils();
switch(current.operation()) {
	case('insert'):
		var result = toggl.syncResource(current, 'Create');
		current.u_id = result.data.id;
		current.setWorkflow(false);
		current.update();
		break;
	case('update'):
		toggl.syncResource(current, 'Update');
		break;
	case('delete'):
		toggl.syncResource(current, 'Delete');
	default:
		break;
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-22 10:04:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2deb6a912f7210109a34206df699b618</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggl - Sync Client</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2deb6a912f7210109a34206df699b618</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>miika.kallasoja</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-06 11:25:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2deb6a912f7210109a34206df699b618"/></record_update>
